scenario_text.value: Hey Professor, have you found anything?

This cavity seems to have some sort
of meaning...
What do you mean?
Hmm... I can’t really say.

The Magatama we found just now seems to be
the same shape as this cavity...
Maybe we can use it here.
All right, Takuma. Let’s give it a shot.
Should I put the Magatama in the cavity?
Jam it in!
Slam it down!
Hold it up high!
(I inserted the Magatama into the cavity!)
Takuma! Something moved...
Oh, the floor opened up!
Oh, now we can go inside!

(Okay, I’ll slam the Magatama into the cavity
here!)
Hyaaah!
Takuma! Don’t be so reckless...
Jeez, Takuma, be careful with that thing!

(Okay, I’ll hold up the Magatama in front of
the cavity!)
Hyaaah!
Takuma... Nothing’s happening.
